page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT IN NEWARK
page.content: One of the busiest types of employment is the Craft Centre at Millgate in Newark.Here Wheelwrights,Potters, Woodcraftsmen,Dyers and Antique Dealers are important.There are many builders working in this area which has been re-developed as a conservation area.Over the river itinerant people work at fairs, circuses and are Scrap Metal Dealers. River employment is important.People work on dredgers on the River Trent,on barges and on river launches.There are several employees on the licenced barge on the Trent and at the riverside cafe.Work in the Cattle Market is essential and includes Auctioneers,Typists,Cattle Drovers, Hauliers and Market Traders.In this area also people work at British Rail and the British Sugar Corporation. There is little unemployment here.
